definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)

sentences.english: This NNC is utilized by way of associative memory.
sentences.chinese: 網絡的使用利用聯想記憶法則。

sentences.english: If a new strategy works, then it will be adopted and further routinized as a rule of thumb.
sentences.chinese: 如果新辦法行得通，以後就會沿用而成爲經驗法則。

sentences.english: There was no longer any question of discovering a posteriori laws of social change.
sentences.chinese: 之後便不再有有關社會變革的法則出現。

sentences.english: But a strong Volcker Rule just might take the cake away.
sentences.chinese: 但強硬的沃爾克法則卻會讓這個美夢落空。

sentences.english: Rule eight urges people to put more excitement into their lives.
sentences.chinese: 第八條法則鼓勵人們增添生活情趣。

sentences.english: They have also compiled algorithmic laws of growth for hundreds of seashells and butterflies .
sentences.chinese: 他們還彙集了上百種海貝和蝴蝶的生長算法法則。

sentences.english: Growth and change are the law of all life.
sentences.chinese: 生長與變化是一切生命的法則。

sentences.english: Its pathogen has been isolated, proved by the rule of Koch and identified as Corynespora viticis Guo f.
sentences.chinese: 病原菌經分離和柯赫氏法則驗證，爲一種棒孢屬真菌。

sentences.english: To get myself to actually do, my favorite trick is the 50 minutes rule.
sentences.chinese: 努力讓自己上路，我的錦囊妙計是50分鐘法則。

sentences.english: Aim To explain and analyze Cardano′ s" golden rule" in Ars Magna.
sentences.chinese: 目的解釋並分析卡爾達諾的“黃金法則”。

sentences.english: And he defines it almost in terms of laws of physics.
sentences.chinese: 而他解釋時運用的大多是物理的法則。

sentences.english: Now it's time to tackle your unenforceable rule.
sentences.chinese: 該是解決你的不可強制執行法則的的時候了。

sentences.english: We expose our mortal flesh to the laws of the physical environment around us.
sentences.chinese: 我們使易朽的肉體服從周圍物理環境的法則。

sentences.english: L′Hospital law is an important tool of obtaining undetermined type limit.
sentences.chinese: 洛比達法則是求待定型極限的重要工具。

sentences.english: My son, hear the instruction of thy father, and forsake not the law of thy mother
sentences.chinese: 我兒，要聽你父親的訓誨，不可離棄你母親的法則。

sentences.english: Well, we can answer that. The chain rule is something like this.
sentences.chinese: 可以用鏈式法則來回答這個問題。

definition: rule (e.g. of science)/law of behavior/regular pattern/rhythm/discipline
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
harmonious/to mediate/to reconcile/to compromise/mediation/to mix/to blend/blended/to season/seasoning/to placate
